sn35.20:1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, rupe abhinandati, dukkham so abhinandati.
sn35.20:1.2: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn35.20:1.8: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasma”ti vadami.
sn35.20:2.1: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rupe nabhinandati, dukkham so nabhinandati.
sn35.20:2.2: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasma”ti vadami.
sn35.20:2.8: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasma”ti vadami.
